Document.name: GetNearestCaretFromTextPos
Document.summary: Get the nearest caret from a text position.
Document.returns: The caret. Returns -1 if failed. If the text position is a caret, then the result will be the text position itself without considering the frontSide argument.
Document.param: The caret to compare. If the position is CaretFirst or CaretLast, this argument is ignored.
Set to true to search in front of the text position, otherwise the opposite position.
